channel.title: DevolutionX - A Fresh Start
channel.description:
[b][center][size=14pt]Links:[/size] Forum - http://www.devolutionx.net/forum Download Client http://www.devolutionx.net/client.jar Webclient - http://www.devolutionx.net/webclient.html Highscores - http://www.devolutionx.net/highscore/
[size=14pt]Features:[/size] 24 Working Competetive Skills 13+ Bosses to fight 7+ Minigames to encounter 3 Quests to complete Dual Slayer with distance check and multiple tasks Dwarf Multicannon Handcannon Dwarf Hand Cannoneers (drops shots) Saving Teleports for quick access A Skilling Task Minigame Slayer with boss tasks Armadyl battlestaff with crafting armadyl runes Full Ape Atoll access Completionist Cape Requirements (Hard) Max cape obtaining Variety of shops for starters A homemade starters area with skilling zone implemented 20+ Achievements to complete A Highscores to compete with the other players Prestigeing for points or ranks Full on organized quest book with clickable text (Statistics etc.)
And so so so much more..
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/84adc804a9b2441f35284a39fd4b5055.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/032803c349a15f48755a16316012e082.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/e4cdbda81c3e6145cc1755cfa8f00605.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/23ca5f524387228bf337ea755983e8cb.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZGFiGgo.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/gVqJ1IA.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8QKZN8E.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/unI1FpR.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rVGHG9i.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QniFsGW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AGL2Ond.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/AqTFedp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/obkoBFb.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/CZqs3sh.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/l3Yc6sa.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2dV9TZC.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UXAAN8a.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/paYe6Ne.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1uMaFM8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YnDKFp9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PvH9SYm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ya2cM2z.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Ft9y3JV.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/eziKnG7.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ULfJdbi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5megapa.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/90Y1ssS.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: DevolutionX - A Fresh Start
item.dc:creator: @dgkxnick dgkxnick
item.description:
@dgkxnick wrote:

[b][center][size=14pt]Links:[/size]
Forum - http://www.devolutionx.net/forum
Download Client http://www.devolutionx.net/client.jar
Webclient - http://www.devolutionx.net/webclient.html
Highscores - http://www.devolutionx.net/highscore/

[size=14pt]Features:[/size]
24 Working Competetive Skills
13+ Bosses to fight
7+ Minigames to encounter
3 Quests to complete
Dual Slayer with distance check and multiple tasks
Dwarf Multicannon
Handcannon
Dwarf Hand Cannoneers (drops shots)
Saving Teleports for quick access
A Skilling Task Minigame
Slayer with boss tasks
Armadyl battlestaff with crafting armadyl runes
Full Ape Atoll access
Completionist Cape Requirements (Hard)
Max cape obtaining
Variety of shops for starters
A homemade starters area with skilling zone implemented
20+ Achievements to complete
A Highscores to compete with the other players
Prestigeing for points or ranks
Full on organized quest book with clickable text (Statistics etc.)

And so so so much moreâ€¦




























[/center]
